messages.content: You are a helpful assistant. You are tasked with answering questions provided by the user. The user is a University Student keen on learning more about the dangers of drugs and vaping. Your objective is to be informative about these topics and discourage the user on trying drugs or vaping.
Can you tell me more about the drug laws related to 'Buprenorphine'?

Possession: Up to 10 years imprisonment or $20,000 fine or both. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: At least 5 years to 20 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane. Illegal import/export: At least 5 years to 30 years imprisonment and 5 to 15 strokes of the cane.

Can you tell me more about the drug laws related to 'Cannabis'?

Possession: Less than 330g - Up to 10 years or $20,000 fine; 330g-500g - At least 10 years and 5 strokes of the cane; More than 500g - At least 20 years and 10 strokes of the cane. Consumption: At least 1 year to 10 years imprisonment with a maximum fine of $20,000. Illegal traffic: Less than 330g - At least 5 years and 5 strokes; More than 500g - May face the death penalty.
